info.author: Anders Dahnielson
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
FTGL is a free, open source library to enable developers to use
arbitrary fonts in their OpenGL applications. Unlike other OpenGL font
libraries FTGL uses standard font file formats and the Freetype font
library to open the fonts. PyFTGL in turn wraps the functionality of
FTGL into a Python module so that it can be used in conjunction with
PyOpenGL.
info.name: PyFTGL
info.html_description: FTGL is a free, open source library to enable developers to use arbitrary fonts in their OpenGL applications. Unlike other OpenGL font libraries FTGL uses standard font file formats and the Freetype font library to open the fonts. PyFTGL in turn wraps the functionality of FTGL into a Python module so that it can be used in conjunction with PyOpenGL.
